website_summaries.verdict: A cleaver that works well while having a beautiful design.
pros: Made of premium AUS-10 high carbon steel
Polished pakkawood handle is easy to hold
Blade is very sharp and offers long-lasting performance
cons: Some buyers say this is more appropriate to use as a vegetable cleaver rather than a meat cleaver

customer_reviews.title: Great Chopper for big hands
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with some other items to explore Asian/indian cooking. love it, the weight is good, very sharp and the pakawood is smooth warm and primitive. not sure how the edge will hold up, but I enjoy sharpening and this is available in a 62+ hardness (for additional money). if your thinking about getting an ungodly expensive competitor? unless you are a pro, reconsider; for under $200 total I was able to get the knives, board, scale, wok,sushi kit, and thermometer. Thanks Tuo Cutlery, you are making affordable cooking dreams come true!
customer_reviews.author: Jcnva

customer_reviews.title: Great Meat Cleaver Knife
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday and it is really a great knife. I thought I would need a bunch of knives in my kitchen, but this one will do the work of several. If you want to give this as a gift, it comes in a great box. Very well done TUO Cutlery.
customer_reviews.author: Mathilda Mandrake

customer_reviews.title: Kick ass knife!
customer_reviews.text: I cook a lot and use a wide variety of tools in the kitchen. That being said, this is by far my favorite. It's incredibly sharp from the factory, the craftsmanship surprised me in the best of ways, the weight and balance of the knife is spot on for my liking. I was uncertain about this purchase initially but I am so glad I went this route. Just go for it! You will be pleased
customer_reviews.author: Stephen williams

customer_reviews.title: My new everyday use knife
customer_reviews.text: I have had this knife now for about a month, I love it. The size is great for just about everything. I now have no desire to go back to a traditional 8" chef's knife. Coming from a former chef, I highly recommend this knife to everyone from the home-cook to the professional. It has a nice solid weight which I love, so far it has been holding a great edge.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Fischer

customer_reviews.title: my new favorite prep tool
customer_reviews.text: This knife looks very good to the eye and feels great in the hand... wicked sharp out of the box and well finished with a gentle curve to the blade... comfortable and well controlled meat and veggie cutting made easy... I like it... NO worries and NO regrets...!
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these knives to form a set for my brother who is a chef. He loved them and still hasn’t stopped thanking me. They arrived in a gorgeous box on time. The wood handles are beautiful. Brother had them professionally sharpened and says they are perfection.
customer_reviews.author: G C

customer_reviews.title: I recommend the entire set.
customer_reviews.text: I have fallen in love with oriental vegetable knives and their varying styles. A nice high blade rest against your knuckles and moves as smoothly as, well, a 'Tuo' seven inch vegetable knife. This is a thing of beauty that fits very well in my medium sized hand. The curved blade makes a forward cutting motion nice and smooth. I now have all of the knives in the "Firey Phoenix" set. Each of the knives in this product line is as beautiful as this one. Good, long lasting blade edge. Nice weight too.
customer_reviews.author: mousehound369

customer_reviews.title: Great knife/cleaver!
customer_reviews.text: So far this knife is everything I was hoping for. It has the perfect curve for cutting, dicing, and mincing vegetables. The blade came sharp and after several uses has held up great. Finish on the steel is good and cleans with ease and no watermark or mineral stains after repeated cleaning. Handle feels great and looks good as well. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesma

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife
customer_reviews.text: Came exceptionally sharp, love the handle, feels great in the hand. Wanted to get another to gift for secret santa, but it isn't currently available. Link goes to a slightly different version by TUO. This is for the orange/black wood grain handle version, not the curved black handle. If you properly hold the blade with your thumb and forefinger, while gripping handle with 3 remaining fingers, this knife handles and cuts like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Not a veggie slicer it does say meat cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Vg10 is great material and my minimum hardness of 60. The knife is beautiful. For me the blade was not thin enough at the edge. The choil and spine are not rounded and will be uncomfortable for extended use. Sandpaper can easily fix that. Calaphon LX had the same issue as does the dalstrong gladiator cleaver. I was bummed it didn't work out. The cleave next to the Tuo is a CCK large slicer. 9inches for comparison. Additionally it had no flat spots contact curved top to heel. Rocker not a chopper.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Not a meat cleaver...
customer_reviews.text: Was in love with this knife at first, cut everything like it was butter and performed somewhat like a Santuko but with the weight and heft of a cleaver. Feels wonderful in the hand, looks beautiful, but alas, at month two I finally tried it out as a meat cleaver on some turkey bones, and the blade was badly bent. Super disappointed, this was my first adult knife, sigh. If it weren't for this it would have had five stars...
customer_reviews.author: Tyranasaurus tam

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended..
customer_reviews.text: While browsing amazons cleaver section the lines of this knife caught my eye,lm a vegan so lm cutting many veggies every day,l also have lots of knives on magnetic bars some of which lve made myself, but find invariably lm reaching for this knife,it's top quality and makes food prep a pleasure,thank you TUO for raising the bar on cutlery, highly recommended....Paul C.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Cut Above The Rest
customer_reviews.text: Of all my chefy knives, this is my go-to for nearly everything! I saw a video of a Szechuan Chef who said that the vegetable cleaver is the all-purpose knife in their culinary school and after seeing everything that could be done with it, I had to give it a try! The wide blade is great for heavy duty chopping and scooping. The rounded blade is great for those long chopping sessions or fine mincing. The handle is beautiful and it has stayed fairly sharp, all though I sharpen it frequently. It’s a show stopper and not only is it functionally a great knife but people commonly comment on how beautiful it is!
customer_reviews.author: FerristOfThemAll

customer_reviews.title: Versatile go-to prep knife
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully balanced and razor sharp. Chops through the most dense items like carrots and potatoes with ease and confidence. As a larger knife it’s also deftly able to mince fine items like parsley or garlic. Large blade allows for easy scooping and transferring of sliced food to pots and pans. Have owned and used for several weeks and it’s definitely my go-to blade.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this without high expectations and was pleasantly surprised by the sturdiness and sharpness of this cleaver. It has become my go to for most jobs in the kitchen and retains a good edge with regular honing. While it obviously is not on the same level as a professional quality knife it absolutely can handle regular home use with zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: I was watch a video Japanese cooks using there knife skills to prepare a hundred pound tuna. This knife resembles the ones they were using that could slice through the body of the tuna in a single cut. The TOU knife arrived in an elegant box with a foam insert shaped to the blade. This is the sharpest knife I’ve ever owned. It is well balanced with a beautiful handle. I just ordered another kakiri knife from TOU, what else can I say.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Morris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this knife. I have for years used a 7" nakiri knife as my every day knife. I like it a lot but the handle isn't super comfortable. The vegetable cleaver arrived well packaged, undamaged, and very sharp. I've used in now for almost 3 months and it has become my daily use knife. It took a little getting used to with the greater depth of blade but the handle is comfortable, it has a nice heft, and after nearly 3 months of daily use it is still very sharp (with use on an end grain cutting board). I recommend this knife for both the quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, looks great, is great!
customer_reviews.text: This blade makes me feel like I'm a PROFESSIONAL professional culinary expert. I didn't realize how sharp it truly was until I nearly chopped my finger off. Thankfully I only carved off a section of my nail. The blade allows for such smooth chopping and slicing action. If I had the space I would buy two more!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Harris

customer_reviews.title: A chef's knife is a make it or break it item.
customer_reviews.text: By far the best knife I have used and owned. Want to chop, to rock, to slice, to pick up. This is it. Super Sharp and very well made. I do not put mine in the dishwasher, I only hand wash, I've had it for a couple months now, and it's as sharp as it was the day it arrived. Def my go to knife.
customer_reviews.author: James H

customer_reviews.title: Look at it too hard and it chips, maybe a bad knife who knows
customer_reviews.text: Get this blade on anything harder than an orange it will chip, dropped it today and it chipped. It fell on the but of the knife and than tipped over. How it happened I dont know. 2nd time it chipped on me and here I am sharpening out the chip
customer_reviews.author: Emir

customer_reviews.title: Great knife at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He goes on annual fishing trips and cuts up lots of fish over a short amount of time and he was in need of a good knife. This was perfect. Only thing missing is a travel sheath but we keep it stored in the original box and that's been working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: M. P. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: excellent knife, amazing price
customer_reviews.text: the friends with whom i quarantined had this knife, and i loved using it. i was sure it would be crazy expensive, but when i saw the price, i bought one for me, and one for a gift. one of the best buys on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I havent used it a ton, so not sure how the blade will hold up. But following 10 uses its razor sharp, comfortable feel if you like cleaver like me, picks up loads of vegetables, rocks and chops well. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good kitchen knife.
customer_reviews.text: Knife is a good all round kitchen knife. Cutting and scooping food to throw in the bowl or pan is easy with this blade. Would recommend the knife. Keep a good sharpener handy. I've had a few tiny chips in the edge of the blade. Not sure what caused the chips but my wife and i use this knife alot so it could've been either one of us.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This too me is a great chopping knife. I use this often. The knife gets real sharp which makes it easy for slicing as well as chopping. I have been using this knife for about a year now. This is my go to knife.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product at an Amazing price
customer_reviews.text: The knife is better than expected. It has great quality and cuts through everything with minimal effort. I'll be looking to purchase more items from this brand!
customer_reviews.author: mslorraine101

customer_reviews.title: Razor sharp - caution
customer_reviews.text: I do like this knife. Two wishes - I wish it were overall a little heavier, and I wish it had a blade guard. It really is sharp. That's not a complaint, just that a guard would make it harder to have an accident.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hafemann

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wait; buy it
customer_reviews.text: Usually don’t review products, this knife was a good price, and I use it every day. It’s externally sharp! It’s also a very good knife for vegies, meats and everything else I have used it for. At this price I would say buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great knife.
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional chef of 20 years. Just got this for my home knife. I am used to paying $300 for a knife....for the price this blade is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Meatwad

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I don't know how this will hold up after it has been sharpened, but straight out of the box it is really sharp. Handle is beautiful wood.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife. Pleased Working Mother
customer_reviews.text: Love the knife and I am not a knife connoisseur. Did the trick for me and it’s well made and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite chef knife!
customer_reviews.text: I know I'm not an expert on knives, but I couldn't ask for anything more, sharp, stay sharp feels great in the hand! What more can you ask for? And it's a handsome knife!
customer_reviews.author: arn wilson

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: oh this is bad. that little pokey edge at the tip will knick you. I have been cut 3 times by it. Stay away from this knife
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rico

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice knife. The finish, the weight, and the craftsmanship are great. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Roudemus

customer_reviews.title: You can use it for anything not just meet. Get creative!
customer_reviews.text: Are use this product for everything not only for slicing meat but also baking, slicing frozen fruits and vegetables etc. I can’t believe how Great this product is. I will definitely buy it again as a gift or just for myself as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Gaibor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well constructed, super sharp, an amazing cross of a heavy cleaver and a lightweight Chinese cleaver. I use it to cut through chicken bones and cut vegetables. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the shape of this knife
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of this knife. So much, that I have one for home and one for work. I like to be able to work between this and my chef's knife. I do wish it came with a sheath for storing in my knife bag. But the product is great, sharp, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great knife for the price.
customer_reviews.text: While I’m still trying the product out, but so far I love it. It has a nice heavy weight, the side of the blade has all the details on it including it’s hardness which is 54 (most French knifes are 54-56) which is a great number for stainless it makes it easier to sharpen. The edge retention and blade durability will take time to test. Overall it’s a great knife for the price
customer_reviews.author: Nelson D. Mathews-Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great knives so far. Will write updated review in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It’s super sharp and love the way in feels in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Shirin

customer_reviews.title: Top quality. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: The feel and quality of ths product are right for me. Works great and easy to keep razor sharp with a steel.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Oberg

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Barely used for a couple of months and the sharpness has reduced tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sharp and efficient .  Great grip!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea it would be this nice ! Purchased for Vacation condo, but it’s as good as my Hinkel’s. Stunned.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: impressive
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this work of art is beautiful and super sharp. It slices through vegetables like they were butter!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Wardon

customer_reviews.title: better than i thought!!
customer_reviews.text: for the price, i didn't expect this level of quality. it's sharp, balanced, sharp, and it's sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Omega Man

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, nice hold, room to sharpen
customer_reviews.text: Very solid for the price. Sharp out the box, enough steel to sharpen later on. Worth the price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: hawthorneb1

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised then wowed! Packaging was nice, knife looked good but the first cut... I accidentally cute the cutting board🤣. Definitely great quality and sharp. I know items full over time but some weren’t even this great out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Fraser

customer_reviews.title: my favorite veggie chopper
customer_reviews.text: I work in commercial kitchens. The picture was intriguing, and the reality is, perhaps, my favorite veggie chopper. If I had 5 thumbs, I would give it 5 thumbs up. Good steel. Good design. Really is a nice knife.
customer_reviews.author: T B Harris

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!! Well made! Works fantastic! Chef approved.
customer_reviews.text: What a knife! Bought for my fiancé who is a chef and this has become his favorite knife. He LOVES it! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great knife - made VERY well
customer_reviews.text: Great knife - made VERY well, and has great balance; the quality of the steel and handle material are the best! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Dumont

customer_reviews.title: A stunner!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! stunning! Nice weight, perfectly sharpened, and the handle is a dream! It came beautifully packaged, so I would definitly give this as a gift to an avid cook!
customer_reviews.author: Jyps

customer_reviews.title: Good price and works as it should be
customer_reviews.text: Nice knife, proper weight, might be a little big for who not used to this type knife. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Performs like it's worth $200
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't need another 5 star review. But I'm going one any ways because it's just WOW! I'm still kind waiting for the catch. Its incredible how great this knife is for the price point. It just goes to show that high value doesn't always mean high quality and vice versa.
customer_reviews.author: KSM

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to our knife collection
customer_reviews.text: We've used this for about a month now. Craftsmanship is beautiful. It is perfectly weighted and fits in both mine and my husband's hands very well. Cuts through onion and other veg like BUTTER!
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Casey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and balanced
customer_reviews.text: This knife is the workhorse of the kitchen. It’s well balanced, has a lovely comfortable handle and a very sharp heavy blade.
customer_reviews.author: A. Feinman

customer_reviews.title: what a great knife
customer_reviews.text: good weight, sharp, love it !!!!!!!!! don't 2nd guess, buy it you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Monkey Bizness

customer_reviews.title: Best knife ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing handles like a pro. I've never owned a knife as amazing as this one. I'd highly recommend to anyone looking to chop carne asada or meat in general, easily. It's so beautiful too
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Sotelo.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I check the reviews before I buy my own knife and i am extremely satisfied with sharp, ergonomic, design this knife can cut water if you understand what I m saying I just cut an avocado sead tiny as a baby hair without any issues also I shave my own arm hair like a crocodile dandy I’m happy enough to say if you wish to Cooke you can buy this product with eyes closed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I have not used it but im wowed by beautiful it is! I am excited to use it and for the first time cook in my new apt!
customer_reviews.author: Poleen

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and look!
customer_reviews.text: Feels great. Not as sharp as I like but that can be fixed quick. Buitiful and versatile. Quick ship. I will re review after some use.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: great chopper blade
customer_reviews.text: love this blade ..had it close to a year now ..still razor sharp
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: for the money, a very good knife
customer_reviews.text: I treat this like the best knife in our kitchen. It is seriously sharp and is a good tool for cutting vegetables and slicing meat.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki McManus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect knife for everything
customer_reviews.text: Love mine. I use it all the time! Sharp! Great handle! Worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy & Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy, This was on sale and I absolutely love this cleaver/vegetable knife
customer_reviews.author: jeffsarge

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has replaced my lovely Shun chefs knife. I use this knife for everything from finely diving onions and peeling to breaking down whole chickens. It's very versatile and all I do is put it on a honing steel every few days and it slices like a hot knife through butter!
customer_reviews.author: christopher quarto

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Love my new butcher knife. Love that it also comes with it's own box so I can stow it away safely
customer_reviews.author: E. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edge and solid weight
customer_reviews.text: Great product for its price! Has a very nice weight without feeling heavy for a solid hand grip. It looks very nice and I get many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it. And inexpensive for the quality, thoughs 10 yr old child workers are getting better every day.
customer_reviews.author: david morales

customer_reviews.title: Clean cut without slipping or hesitation
customer_reviews.text: I had enormous raw carrots that I had to cut lengthwise. This knife went through like butter, without any hesitation. Easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to knife for everything. Solid weight, keeps it edge, also looks cool. Comes in a nice box to keep the edge - great gift - again this is a really sharp knife so be careful
customer_reviews.author: JoKap

customer_reviews.title: A blade that is SHARPE
customer_reviews.text: SUPER SHARPE. Good for big or semi small food products
customer_reviews.author: charles chilson

customer_reviews.title: TUO great knives great price
customer_reviews.text: Great knife, wicked sharp. Very happy with this knife so much that I started exclusively using it for every task but peeling.

customer_reviews.title: Love design
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design. Love the box it came in. Very sharo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal...looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible deal...looks amazing...heavy and razor sharp...comes in a box no sheath...incredible feel in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Joe n Vals.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to Hold
customer_reviews.text: Just having this cleaver makes you want to eat more healthy. Light weight, handsome design and solid structure.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Very surprising how good these are. Will buy more in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Lee E. Quessenberry

customer_reviews.title: Great handle and feel
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. The weight and the size. My only problem is it lost its edge after like 3 or 4 uses. As far as super sharp goes.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Pfeiffer

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband and he's been using it every night!!

customer_reviews.title: ... knife and this fills the need and now I'm happy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because I wanted a rocking Asian Chef knife and this fills the need and now I'm happy.

customer_reviews.title: good to buy
customer_reviews.text: I like this Meat Cleaver Knife. It's so good to use.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and beautiful!! The wood is very beautiful it was a gift so I don’t know about performance but it is heavy duty so I can tell it will work great

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Love it absolutely love it in my opinion perfect blade easy to handle.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this knife
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this knife. I do a lot of chopping in the kitchen and it's seems to be made well. Very sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Swedish Chef like.
customer_reviews.text: I love this blade. I might not be with the prettiest brunoise yet this knife makes me want to try harder & post on Insta.

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality, I've used it so many times already for general purpose, and I really like the size of the blade. Balance and sturdiness feels good in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Evigilant

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have for your Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Much sharper than I anticipated and a great feel in your hand while using. I use for vegetables as well as a variety of meats.. Being a big steak eater this knife works great!
customer_reviews.author: Big Worm

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic knife
customer_reviews.text: I really like this knife . The handke alloescuou to have a good grip and control , the blade is very sharp , it slices minces,chops, beautifuly . So happy I bought ut

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful cleaver, very easy to hold, chops very well, love the handle

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful knife! Great quality for the price. I would really like to have the rest of this set!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cleaver.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cleaver and nicely weighted. The handle is beautiful. My only complaint and not really is that the handles is a little slippery and I have to be mindful of that.

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It's a little big for me - I have small hands. But it is comfortable to hold, it is sharp, and cuts well.

customer_reviews.title: 110% highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had also purchased the 4" paring knife both are a pleasure to use Comfortable to use and keeps an edge
customer_reviews.author: Chipmister

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  knife for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife. I’ve only had it for a few weeks but it’s very sharp and cuts veggies beautifully. I haven’t cut any meat or bones with it but if you like a heavier knife for veg. It’s a great knife for the price
customer_reviews.author: danielle linden

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic knife
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift and my Husband was very pleased. He uses it everyday and wishes we had gotten one years ago. It is a fantastic addition to our kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful knife
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp out the box my husband is a chef and the kids wanted to get him this for Father’s Day. He loves it and can’t wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tdouglas

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: Great knife for the price. I have this knife hanging up with my shun knives and use it often. I will probably order more knifes from this company in the future
customer_reviews.author: Billy Hayden

customer_reviews.title: a beautiful and well crafted knife!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only great things to say about this knife. It was a gift to myself and i am so happy with it. i cook every day and this knife helps make something i love doing even more enjoyable!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Such a worthwhile investment. Sliced through a 16oz ribeye with ease. I love this knife

customer_reviews.title: Not to be used other than vegetables
customer_reviews.text: The edge cracked after cutting a chicken bone. Very delegate. Can only be used to cut vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Sivram

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen knife.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I do a lot of cooking and have some very high quality knives for the kitchen and this cleaver makes a great addition. It is well balanced with a nice wooden handle. Cuts beautifully. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Yedowitz Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. The appearance is very nice and the utility of the blade has been exceptional so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TUO Cutlery Cleaver Knife - Japanese AUS-10 Damascus Steel - Chinese Chef's Knife for meat and vegetable with Ergonomic Pakkawood Handle - 7" - Fiery Phoenix Series
feature_bullets: 🔪Fiery Phoenix was selected as one of the world-best kitchen knives by wiki.ezvid.com in 2016. Among all kinds of a kitchen knife, a Chinese cleaver is one of the most multi-function knives in the kitchen.

✅Adopted premium AUS-10 high carbon steel as core of the blade, sandwiched with 66 layers of softer steel, it features a high level of rust-resistance, long-lasting performance and stunning dragon-keel pattern on the blade. The steel is precisely processed with vacuum heat treatment and nitrogen cooling treatment, reaching the high hardness at 62+/-2 HRC and great edge retention.

✅The edge is hand sharpened by highly-skilled knife smiths using the traditional 3-step Honbazuke method, each side of the blade is honed at 18 degrees. This razor-sharp blade provides for unmatched efficiency. Your work in the kitchen is done in no time!

✅From the striking grain of the polished pakkawood handle to the gentle curve of the blade, this is an ergonomic handle design for exceptional comfort and durability. The Pakka wood (sourced from Africa) is unique for each handle; luxurious & beautiful.

💯A Fiery Phoenix kitchen has an international & multi-functional feel. 100% SATISFACTION OR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, try it risk free, we know you'll love it! With the luxury packing it is also the wise choice as a gift
